[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@svelte-put/shortcut](./shortcut.md) &gt; [ShortcutEventDetails](./shortcut.shortcuteventdetails.md)

## ShortcutEventDetails interface

`detail` payload for 'shortcut' [CustomEvent](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CustomEvent)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ShortcutEventDetails 
```

## Example


```svelte
<script>
 import { shortcut, type ShortcutEventDetails } from '@svelte-put/shortcut';

 function onShortcut(event: CustomEvent<ShortcutEventDetails>) {
   if (event.detail.trigger.id === 'my-shortcut') {
     console.log('do something');
   }
 }
<script/>

<window
 use:shortcut={{
   trigger: {
     key: 'k ,
     modifier: ['ctrl'],
     id: 'my-shortcut',
   },
 }}
 on:shortcut={onShortcut}
/>
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [node](./shortcut.shortcuteventdetails.node.md) |  | HTMLElement | the node that the action was placed on |
|  [trigger](./shortcut.shortcuteventdetails.trigger.md) |  | [ShortcutTrigger](./shortcut.shortcuttrigger.md) | the shortcut trigger of this event |
